Parameter.Name: Direction
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Notes: Direction for a Numeric sensor value to change.
Used in Sensor Change Modes that have an Amount input.
0 = Increase
1 = Decrease
2 = Any

Parameter.Name: Port
Parameter.Description: Many programming blocks require that you select the ports on the EV3 Brick (A, B, C, D, 1, 2, 3, and 4) that these blocks will use. The Port Selectors are in the top right-hand corner of these blocks.

Parameter.Name: Comparison
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Allowed Values: 0 - 5
Notes: 0: = (Equal to)
1: ≠ (Not Equal to)
2: > (Greater than)
3: ≥ (Greater than or Equal to)
4: < (Less than)
5: ≤ (Less than or Equal to)

Parameter.Name: Threshold
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Allowed Values: Any number
Notes: Value to compare sensor data to

Parameter.Name: Change
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Notes: Amount for sensor value to change in a Sensor Change Mode

Parameter.Name: Result
Parameter.Description:
Type: Logic
Notes: True/False result of a Compare mode.

Parameter.Name: Angle
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Notes: Rotation angle in degrees.
Measured from the last reset.
Reset with the Reset mode.

Parameter.Name: Rate
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Notes: Rotation rate in degrees per second.

Block.Description: The Measure – Angle mode outputs the rotation angle in Angle. The angle is measured relative to the last time the sensor was reset. Use the Reset mode to reset the angle to 0.
The Measure – Rate mode outputs the rotation rate in Rate.

The Compare – Angle mode compares the rotation angle to the Threshold Value using the selected Compare Type. The True/False result is output in Compare Result, and the rotation angle is output in Angle.
The Compare – Rate mode compares the rotation rate to the Threshold Value using the selected Compare Type. The True/False result is output in Compare Result, and the rotation rate is output in Rate.
The Reset mode resets the rotation angle of the sensor to 0 (zero). Measurements of the rotation angle measure the motion relative to the last time the sensor was reset.

Each of the sensor types listed in the Wait block has one or more Change modes. A Change mode will continuously read data from the sensor and wait for it to change to a different value, or change by an amount that you specify. You can wait for some types of sensor data to change by a certain Amount, and other types to change to a different value.
